item.title: React - Ideal Directory Structure
item.description: Personally I find directory structures like the example below very frustrating when working with or working towards any modular front-end. Building React components for little over two years (from the date of this post) emphasises we need to evolve this structure into something practical when building/maintaining React components. For example: - dist - src - main - web - pages - containers - scripts - templates - styles - tests .
